heatmaply workflow
==================
cor_mat <- cor(tcga_pam50_expression)
dimnames(cor_mat) <- NULL

heatmaply(cor_mat, 
    plot_method = "plotly",
    col_side_colors=tcga_brca_clinical)

heatmaply(cor(t(tcga_pam50_expression)))
